description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Physics-based gerbil demolition fun!  Buildings formed of gerbils await destruction for your amusement using a variety of demolition tools.  Use bombs, ropes and disintegrators across 24 levels of gerbil mayhem including the 'terrifying' Iron Gerbils.  No gerbils were hurt during the making of this game. (Version 1.1)
description.short: Physics-based gerbil demolition fun!  Buildings formed of gerbils await destruction for your amusement using a variety of demolition tools.
